description: Pre-post-update definition to make bolt not throw a warning. Best to use pre_update or post_update directly.

script.description: Absolute path of the script to execute. If no script name is passed on Linux hosts a default is used: /opt/patching/bin/pre_update.sh. If no script name is passed  on Windows hosts a default is used: C:/ProgramData/patching/bin/pre_update.ps1.
